doc.title: Please Let Me Sleep
doc.plot: This is a drama tragedy about a man named Ryan McArthur, a man in his twenties, who lost everything in a tragic car accident. He lost his most beloved sister, Cecil McArthur, a bright young man with a great future. He lost his future, his passion to live. He is now a confused young man who finds his refuge in the comfort of the white powder, heroin. He was to go over his limit by taking an excessive dose to end his life when suddenly he encounters a sudden presence of his dead sister, who?s there to stop him from killing himself. The story lies in the conflict between the two characters, how one wishes to die and how one wishes for the other one to continue living.
